title: Psychosis
summary: Psychosis is an abnormal condition of the mind that results in difficulties determining what is real and what is not real.[4] Symptoms may include delusions and hallucinations, among other features.[4] Additional symptoms are incoherent speech and behavior that is inappropriate for a given situation.[4] There may also be sleep problems, social withdrawal, lack of motivation, and difficulties carrying out daily activities.[4] Psychosis can have serious adverse outcomes.[6]
